::Reptilica/Zardus::

Reptilica nods. "Zardus," he says, not bothering to use his comm link due to 
the fact that the Alliance commander was exiting the base at the moment, 
"There are a few bots that want a word with you..."

Zardus turns, looking behind Reptilica at the three Vok in the shuttle. He 
raises an eyebrow, waiting for them to speak.
